name: Ultimate Survival
description:
You found yourself on a desert island, in the hands of only an ax with which you must survive. Build houses, get food, create weapons and crush cannibalistic tribes.

Key Features:
- Custom FPS Controller
- Player Statistics
- Camera system (shake, pain HUD)
- Tools
- Weapons
- The movement of procedural weapons
- Inventory
- Creation
- Workstations
- Storage Boxes
- Hot Panel
- Player equipment
- Mining
- Trees
- Passive and aggressive animals
- Enemy A.I. (cannibals)
- Socket Based Building System
- Day and night cycle
- Surface texture based system
